::Vamprah::

"It's seems that the Big-boss had decided to move" Say Vamprah afther 
she reached dificultly a chair "It's fine for me"

Vamprah felt pain. in her left arm apperaed an small computer.

"Check reparations circuits status..."

"Reparations cicuits with 45% of capacitym for a quick reparation Cr 
is adviced."

"Great..." say annoyed Vamprah

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:

shuttles

base

in

in

stumble
